name: glass tube production, borosilicate | glass tube, borosilicate | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1686/documentation

Production of borosilicate glass tubes.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Gate to gate inventory for the production of glass tubes.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/231:Manufacture of glass and glass products/2310:Manufacture of glass and glass products

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Production data for one business year.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Production plant in DE. Some pre-products and waste treatment services estimated with European and Swiss data.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Tube glass manufacturing. Plant data for joint production of borosilicate (20%) and lime-natron-glass (80%) tubes.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Input of raw materials is calculated with data for borosilicate glass. Other data are from a plant with a production mix of borosilicate (20%) and lime-natron-glass (80%).
